# Create DOT Graphs

```{r echo=TRUE, warning=TRUE}
library(deisotoper)
library(DiagrammeR)

objN <- load(system.file("extdata", name = 'TP_HeLa_200ng_filtered_pd21.RData', package = "deisotoper"))
obj <- get(objN)

id <- c(1, 3, 3, 6);
index <- c(7, 5, 9, 3);

dot <-c();

for(i in 1:length(id)) {
  ms <- jCreateMS(obj[id[i]]);
  
  ims <- jCreateIMS(ms)
  
  dot <- c(dot, deisotoper::jGetDot(massspectrum = ms, isotopicmassspectrum = ims, index = index[i]));
}
```


# Display DOT Graphs

```{r fig.cap="Graph of mass spectrum 1, isotopic set 7"}
grViz(dot[1], width = 700)
```

```{r fig.cap="Graph of mass spectrum 3, isotopic set 5"}
grViz(dot[2], width = 700)
```

```{r fig.cap="Graph of mass spectrum 3, isotopic set 9"}

```

```{r fig.cap="Graph of mass spectrum 6, isotopic set 3"}
grViz(dot[4], width = 700)
```
